instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Maps app . Make sure you sign in to your Google Account . Search for your destination or tap it on the map. In the bottom left, tap Directions . At the top, tap Rides . A list of services, prices, and times appears. To search for Lime vehicles near you, tap Transit . Note : Lime vehicles are not available in all cities. Choose the service you want to use. You ll be taken to the provider s app. If you don t have their app installed, you ll be taken to the Play Store to download the app. Follow the instructions in the provider's app to finish your ride request.
